Your photo must include your full head and shoulders.The image of your face  - from the top of your head to the bottom of your chin - must be between 29mm and 34mm high. Make sure that you:Look straight to the cameraHave a neutral face expression and be sure your mouth is closedDo not cover your faceHave a contrast background (plain cream or light grey)Do not cover your head (except of religious or medical reasons)Your eyes are open.Are visible and not covered by sunglasses, glasses frames, tinted glasses, or hair.If you wear normal glasses that you do not have reflection or glare on them.Don’t have the ‘red eye’ effectDo not have shadows in the picture
